name: A Tavern Full of Lies
description:
This is our entry for the 2019 Community Game Jam ! The theme was "The Game Is A Liar".

In "A Tavern Full of Lies" you are an adventurer trying to recruit the best team possible to defeat goblins. You decided to organize an enrollment event and many other adventurers showed up ... but they are not really honest about their skills. Some are terrible liars bragging about their skills, some are honest but not very powerful. You will have to figure out the best pick for your mighty team ! :) 

There is a downloadable zip for Windows as well if you want to play in 1080p.

Good luck !

The team :

  • Gerald : Graphics ;
  • Shashimee : Coding and music ;
  • Wydman : Coding and sounds.
